# Section 2 {#section-2}

Of course we can plot figures.

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="Distribution of carat values in `ggplot2::diamonds`"}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram(color = "white", fill = "cornflowerblue", bins = 25)
```
